text: Joshua Booth Green (born February 11, 1970) is an American politician and physician who is the 9th and current Governor of Hawaii since 2022. In 2018, he became the 14th Lieutenant Governor of Hawaii. He is a member of the Democratic Party. In August 2021, Green announced his candidacy for Governor of Hawaii in the 2022 election.Hawaii Lt. Gov. Josh Green unapologetic in run for governor He won the Democratic nomination in August 2022. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Hawaii Category:Lieutenant Governors of Hawaii Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American physicians
title: Josh Green (politician)
